name: Broken Contact
description:
As social distance is shortened by modern technology, there's a personal aspect that grows continually weaker. TBD explores this relationship in Broken Contact, a co-operative communication puzzle game. One player navigates a seemingly endless maze with the guidance of the other player, but the directions aren't so simple as left and right! Players will need to interpret tone, subtext, and intention through increasingly limiting forms of communication in order to escape the labyrinth of misunderstanding.

For more information about the team and our other projects, visit us at our website!
